description: Number of 'zig-zag' self-avoiding walks on an n X n lattice from a corner to opposite one.
comments: A 'zig-zag' walk does not contain 2 consecutive steps in the same direction.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Self-avoiding walk.
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: a(7) to a(11) computed by _David W. Wilson_
a(12) and a(13) computed by _Luca Petrone_, Dec 31 2015
